about-me.description:
Hi, I'm Ricardo, a frontend developer from Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany. 
My goal is to realize visually appealing and interactive user interfaces. 
My studies in media design have sharpened my eye for detail and brought out my visual aspirations. 
I acquired the technical skills for the implementation of web applications in a further training course at the Developer Akademie GmbH. 
With the combined skills in creativity and technology I am now looking for a team to realize interesting projects together.

skills.description: Here is a list of the technologies I have familiarized myself with in my projects.

portfolio.description: Take a look at my projects and see for yourself.

text.question: Do you need support with a project?
text.answer: Then let's realise your ideas together!
text.call-to-action: I look forward to hearing from you.

privacy-policy-terms.after: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
